scripts.docker:ready: docker build -t diogenesoftoronto/connex-credit-activation:1.0 . && docker push diogenesoftoronto/connex-credit-activation:1.0 && docker run -p 1984:3000 diogenesoftoronto/connex-credit-activation:1.0
scripts.Heroku:ready: npx Heroku build && npx Heroku push && npx Heroku run

name: connex_credit_activation
description: a simple webpage to allow their customers to activate their credit card.
author: diogenesoftoronto
